65.eng-name: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Abu Ma'mar] Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Abdul Warits] dari [Abdul Aziz] dari [Anas] dia berkata; Nabi shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam berdo'a; "RABBANAA AATINA FID DUNYA HASANATAN WA FIL AKHIRATI HASANAH WAQIAN ADZABAN NAAR (Ya Allah berilah kami kebaikan di dunia dan di akhirat, dan lindungilah kami dari adzab neraka)

chapter.ara-name: باب {وَمِنْهُمْ مَنْ يَقُولُ رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ}
chapter.eng-name: "And of them there are some who say: 'Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good...'" (V.2:201)
